altername_name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol.03 Kamen Rider: The Bike Race
name: Simple Character 2000 Series Vol. 03: Kamen Rider: The Bike Race
overview: Kamen Rider will outrun the Shocker in this racing game aimed at the ultimate goal. Take on a circuit with a total of 13 authentic bikes from the Kamen Rider series. Grand Battle mode takes rival riders across the circuit. Or duke it out in Battle Royal mode!
